comments.text: this trip was composed of 4 or 5 short rides never waited more than ten minutes super nice people

talked to a bus guy who hooked us up with some truckers who were super down to take us up to Georgetown however semi got stuck in a couple hours in and we had to switch to a hilux driver we saw passing by everyone is super nice here and willing to help out

super rural road the truckers we were with got stuck in the mud stayed the night there and were waiting for the semi to get out but when that seemed like  it might take a while we had started talking to the occasional driver on the dirt road very little traffic but the people are super helpful and all things considered it was a relatively minor setback
